add.name: CentaurEntities
add.connectionString: metadata=res://*/Centaur.csdl|res://*/Centaur.ssdl|res://*/Centaur.msl;provider=System.Data.SqlClient;provider connection string=" data source = CT_DB_HOST; initial catalog = CT_DATABASE_NAME; user id = CT_DB_USERNAME; password = CT_DB_PASSWORD; connect timeout = 90000; MultipleActiveResultSets=True;App=EntityFramework"
